caption.p: Timeline, major resources and the milestones of the project on a quarterly basis

tr.td: Literature search, retrieval of S and N protein sequences from repositories. Query sequences will be analyzed to find immunogenic regions using peptide-protein interaction studies
Identify the regions of S and N which are homologous to human protein. A list of peptides with high immunogenicity, location on the protein surface and low hydrophobicity are to be selected

td.p: Peptide synthesis and wetlab validation using sera from patients. Evaluate the antibody formation in response to SARS-CoV-2 infection

tr.td: NCBI BLAST, MSA, IEDB analysis resource database, NetMHC server, EpiJen, MHCpred, EpiSearch, PepSurf, BIMAS, Pep3D
